info.title: Enveloped Application
info.description:
# API
Information about API
# SDK
GetID provides iOS, Android and Web SDKs to simplify user's data capturing.
Links to the SDKs documentation and usage examples:
- [Web](https://github.com/vvorld/getid-web-sdk)
- [iOS](https://github.com/vvorld/getid-ios-sdk)
- [Android](https://github.com/vvorld/getid-android-sdk)

WWW-Authenticate.description: Authentication method that should be used to gain access to a resource

ApiKeyAuth.name: X-API-Key
ApiKeyAuth.description:
You can find token on settings page.
It's required for all API methods.

schema.description: array of userNames, available option "No author" - returns applications without author

additionalFiles.description: Additional files that aren't involved in any check.

documents.description: Documents for data extraction or cross-checking
Documents for data extraction or cross-checking

Fields.description:
Data fields to check.
For example: Last name and Date of birth sent from web form

FieldsV2.description:
Data fields to check.
For example: Last name and Date of birth sent from web form

category.description:
Kind of data.
For example: First name, Last name, Date of birth, Gender

content.description:
The field value. It must be compliant with the category's format.
The gender field can take only two values: male, female
Dates must be in YYYY-MM-DD format
Country fields must be in [alpha-3](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-3#Officially_assigned_code_elements) format
Other fields are plain strings

issuingCountry.description:
The code of the country of issue
([alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2#Officially_assigned_code_elements)
or [alpha-3](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-3#Officially_assigned_code_elements))

The code of the country of issue
([alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2#Officially_assigned_code_elements)
or [alpha-3](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-3#Officially_assigned_code_elements))

files.description: Temporary links to the document photos or scans

category.description:
Kind of data.
For example: First name, Last name, Date of birth, Gender

content.description:
The field value. It must be compliant with the category's format.
The gender field can take only two values: male, female
Dates must be in YYYY-MM-DD format
Country fields must be in [alpha-3](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-3#Officially_assigned_code_elements) format
Other fields are plain strings

uri.description:
Data URI of the media
All common image formats are acceptable.
Acceptable video formats: WebM + VP8, MP4 + AVC

kind.example: selfie, selfie-video, video, nfc-face, selfieVideo, liveness-video, liveness-full-face
front, back, single-page, selfie, selfie-video, video, nfc-face, selfieVideo, liveness-video, liveness-full-face

uri.description:
Data URI of the media
All common image formats are acceptable.

kind.description: The kind of the file. Should be in kebab-case.

uri.description:
Data URI of the media
All common image formats are acceptable.

OverallResult.description: Summary verification result (omitted if state is `processing`)

allOf.description: The worst result from all services

comments.description: Array of results from all services (You can find full results in a servicesResults section)

example.comment: Extracted last name doesn't match data from the field

SummaryResult.description: Summary verification result (omitted if state is `processing`)

status.description: The worst result from all services

example.comment: Extracted last name doesn't match data from the profile

VerificationStatus.description:
The result of verification:
* `approved` - no problems are found
* `declined` - application is declined due to any facts defined as critical in settings
* `needs-review` - some facts are defined as considered in settings
* `error` - error was occurred (wrong or missing input data; service error)

BreakdownStatus.description:
Breakdown status:
* `approved` - check is succeed
* `declined` - check is failed
* `needs-review` - check is failed, manual review is needed
* `disabled` - check is disabled

ProcessingState.description:
Application processing state:
  * `done` - processing is finished
  * `processing` - application is being processed

BaseMetadata.description:
The meta information about the source of the input data.
This field can be used to add custom meta information.
It's also will be added to the response as is.

externalId.description: Use this field to set custom ID from your system

platform.description: The platform type the application is sent from

clientName.description: The name of the client which sent the request

clientVersion.description: The version of the client which sent the request

acVersion.description: The version of the acceptor client which received the request

ipAddress.description: IP from which the request was sent

userAgent.description: user agent data retrieved from user's client which send app from sdk
userAgent.example: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/81.0.4044.122 Safari/537.36

author.description: username or email of author of the request

disableCs.description: allows to disable customer support check

createdBy.description: Represent the source of start of the verification

ip.description: IP from which the request was sent

createdAt.description: time when the application was created

FaceMatching.description: Face-matching service compares photo on the document with selfie

settings.description:
Settings determining result status.
If both threshold are equal, result status can only be `declined` or `approved`

FaceMatchingV2.description: Face-matching service compares photo on the document with selfie

files.description: file ids which were involved in checking

category.description: The name of the extracted field

content.description: The value of the extracted field

locale.description: The locale of the extracted value

extractedFormat.description: The format of extracted date, applicable if date presented not in default format YYYY-MM-DD

documentId.description: ID of the document which data was extracted

fieldChecking.description:
Contains the list of checked fields
If the value corresponding to the field wasn't extracted, such case also would be added to the list

documentId.description: ID of the document which extracted data is compared
ID of the document which extracted data is compared

equal.description: Null means that check between fields on the document was not performed

valid.description: Document field validation result (false means that value is incorrect)

documentId.description: ID of the document which extracted data is compared

sentFields.description: Fields which were sent to watchlists service

WatchlistsRecord.description: Watchlists' record can be any data structure

VerificationTypes.description:
List of requested verifications:
* watchlists - check user on PEPs (fields `First name` and `Last name` must be filled)
* face-matching - compare photo on the document with selfie (selfie list and document list must be provided)
* data-extraction - extract data from the documents (documents must be provided)
* cross-checking - check the conformity between fields and extracted data
If the list isn't provided, all verifications will be applied.

keyword.description:
Means what kind of validation was failed
For example: required, type, format, pattern

dataPath.description: Path to invalid part of data

mrz.description: The raw (non-parsed) MRZ string pulled from the chip.

profile.description: Pre-fill Form fields according SDK configuration

label.description: It is the string which will be viewed in the translation list

dictionary.description: Name of custom dictionary (You should use this name in SDK config)

items.CountryAndDocument_subHeader: Carefully choose document type of document you want to provide for identification
